name: Claws of Anguish
description: Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing 2178 Disease Damage and an additional 2175 Disease Damage over 10 seconds.  Afflicts enemies with Major Defile for 4 seconds, reducing their healing received by 16% and Health Recovery by 16%.    Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
coefDescription: CRIMINAL ACT Shred enemies in front of you with your tainted claws, dealing $1 Disease Damage and an additional $2 Disease Damage over 10 seconds.  Afflicts enemies with Major Defile for 4 seconds, reducing their healing received by 16% and Health Recovery by 16%.    Enemies hit by the initial hit are afflicted with the Diseased status effect.
